welcome_message_body: Welcome to Uckfield, the charming town known for its scenic countryside and rich history. We're thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the smaller of the two terminals, mainly serving domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
